# PrimitivePlottableProtocol

**Protocol**

A type that represents the primitive plottable types supported by the framework. Don’t use this type directly.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol PrimitivePlottableProtocol : Plottable where Self == Self.PrimitivePlottable
```

## Overview

A primitive plottable type is a numeric type like a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Float] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/UInt32] for quantitative values, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/Date] for temporal values, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/String] for categorical values.

Primitive plottable types conform to the [doc://com.apple.Charts/documentation/Charts/Plottable] protocol.

## Inherits From

- Plottable
